metadata.title: CVE-2022-3280 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An open redirect in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from 10.1 prior to15.3.5, 15.4 prior to 15.4.4, and 15.5 prior to 15.5.2 allows an attackerto trick users into visiting a trustworthy URL and being redirected toarbitrary content.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
